prompt:
How can I best leverage the strengths of my introverted personality when networking?
As an introverted person, you might feel more comfortable in smaller, intimate settings where you can connect with others on a deeper level. You might also prefer to engage in one-on-one conversations or participate in group discussions that focus on specific topics or goals. You might be more reflective and thoughtful when considering new connections and opportunities, and value the time needed to build strong relationships based on mutual understanding and respect.
